meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Shaanti Kapila Carlo Abulencia Stephanie Jass Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6457.

td.p: Shaanti Kapila, a climate change specialist from Washington, D.C.
Carlo Abulencia, a stay-at-home dad from Chatsworth, California
Stephanie Jass, a history professor from Milan, Michigan (whose 6-day cash winnings total $123,970)

tr.td: 29 & HOLDING
BODY WORKS
NEW DEAL PROGRAMS
WHAT'S THE SPORT?
BRAND NAMES
"OCK"-TOBERFEST
(Alex: Those three letters will end each correct response.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In his capacity as president of the Senate, vice president John Adams voted a record 29 times because of these')

tr.td: In his capacity as president of the Senate, vice president John Adams voted a record 29 times because of these
